scripts.build-checklet: cp .env.prod .env.local && docker build -t splacorn/checklet . --platform linux/amd64 && docker push splacorn/checklet
scripts.build-nginx: docker build -t splacorn/checklet-nginx:latest -f deploy/nginx/Dockerfile deploy/nginx --platform linux/amd64 && docker push splacorn/checklet-nginx
scripts.build-redis: docker build -t splacorn/checklet-redis:latest -f deploy/redis/Dockerfile deploy/redis --platform linux/amd64 && docker push splacorn/checklet-redis
scripts.read-prod-redis: echo 'unzip a backup and rename it from its datetime to current_backup first. Then run read-prod-redis2' &&  docker build -t splacorn/checklet-read-prod-redis:latest -f deploy/read-prod-db/Dockerfile deploy/read-prod-db && docker run -it -v "$(pwd)/redis_backups/current_backup:/home/redis" -p 6379:6379 splacorn/checklet-read-prod-redis:latest
scripts.deploy-all: yarn build-checklet && yarn build-nginx && yarn build-redis && yarn send-all
